```{r}

library(tidytuesdayR)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(tvthemes)

theme_set(theme_light())

tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2020, week = 33)

```

```{r}
avatar <- tuesdata$avatar
```

```{r}

## ggplot theme
theme_set( theme_avatar(title.font = "Slayer",
               text.font = "Slayer",
               title.size = 8,
               subtitle.size = 8))
```


```{r}
#avatar %>% view()

avatar %>% group_by(book_num,chapter_num,book,chapter) %>% 
  summarise(rating=mean(imdb_rating)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  ggplot(aes(book,rating)) +
  geom_violin()+
  geom_jitter()
  
```
